author: David Ignatius
title: How China can end the covid-19 conspiracy theories before they get worse
description: The world should keep demanding answers until the country explains clearly and transparently what happened.
content: Top scientists I contacted over the past week were skeptical about theories that are spinning about deliberate Chinese attempts to engineer the toxic virus. But many said its possible that a pathogen that was being studied by researchers in Wuhan could have l… [+4702 chars]
